By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 16, 2000 - 11:23 am:

I was looking at the software for the board, and commented to my husband that the old file folders were boring. He said "I can fix that", and asked if I had a GIF of the MR disc. I didn't, so I scanned a picture, he edited it (re-sized, changed colors, animated) and viola! The grapic is 1 KB larger than the old file folders, so it takes an insignificant half-second longer to load.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, November 20, 2000 - 07:35 pm:
